duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first-line customer support by assisting shoppers, answering questions, locating merchandise, and conducting the check-out process.
Stock and display merchandise, following Company merchandising guidelines and safety procedures.
Assist in unloading and sorting merchandise, and maintaining the cleanliness and safety of the store.
Flexibility to work early mornings, late evenings, and weekends for stock, setup, and cleaning responsibilities.
